Mobil Travel Tabrak Rombongan Kasdam Siliwangi
02 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Hilmi Abdul Halim
PURWAKARTA, (PR).- Rombongan kendaraan yang membawa Kepala Staf Daerah Militer III Siliwangi, Brigadir Jenderal Dwi Jati Utomo mengalami kecelakaan di ruas Jalan Tol Purwakarta-Bandung-Cileunyi Kilometer 90, Jumat 1 November 2019 malam. Tabrakan tersebut menewaskan seorang pengendara.
Kepala Satuan Lalulintas Kepolisian Resor Purwakarta, Ajun Komisaris Ricky Adipratama memastikan korban tewas ialah sopir angkutan umum travel tersebut. "Supir tewas di TKP tersebut bernama Pipid Hamidum, 27 tahun asal Kabupaten Serang Banten," katanya, Sabtu, 2 November 2019.
Ricky tidak bisa memastikan kondisi penumpang kendaraan yang membawa prajurit Tentara Nasional Indonesia termasuk Kasdam Siliwangi. Pasalnya, para penumpang beserta kendaraannya langsung dibawa oleh pihak TNI dari lokasi sesaat setelah kejadian.
"Kurang tahu karena pas saya ke sana, TKP sudah clear," kata Ricky menegaskan. Namun, menurut keterangan saksi-saksi di lokasi kejadian, tabrakan diketahui akibat kendaraan travel yang keluar jalur sehingga bertabrakan dengan kendaraan lain di jalur arah sebaliknya.
Kendaraan Toyota Hiace bernomor polisi B 7455 KAA itu melaju dari arah Bandung menuju Jakarta (jalur B). Setibanya di TKP di wilayah Desa Cibodas Kecamatan Sukatani Kabupaten Purwakarta kendaraan tersebut diduga hilang kendali.
"Saat melaju di lajur kanan diduga pengemudi  mengantuk sehingga kendaraan tidak terkendali, oleng ke kanan meluncur ke jalur A," kata Ricky dalam keterangan persnya. Kendaraan umum tersebut langsung bertabrakan dengan kendaraan di Jalur A yang melintas pada saat bersamaan.
Ricky menyebutkan yang terlibat tabrakan antara lain kendaraan travel, mobil Wing Box bernomor D 8168 GD yang dikemudikan Kasiman (38). Serta, dua kendaraan lain yang membawa anggota TNI termasuk Kasdam Siliwangi.
Saat dikonfirmasi melalui Kepala Seksi Intelejen Komando Distrik Militer 0619, Kapten Arm Witopo, kondisi Kasdam dan para personel TNI di dalam mobil tersebut dinyatakan baik-baik saja. "Infonya beliau baik-baik saja, tidak apa-apa," katanya melalui pesan singkat.***

Travel Car Hit the Group of Siliwangi Kasdam
02 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Hilmi Abdul Halim
PURWAKARTA, (PR) .- A group of vehicles carrying the Siliwangi Military Region III Chief of Staff, Brigadier General Dwi Jati Utomo had an accident on the Purwakarta-Bandung-Cileunyi Toll Road 90 Kilometer, Friday 1 November 2019 night. The collision killed a rider.
Head of Purwakarta Resort Police Traffic Unit, Adjunct Commissioner Ricky Adipratama confirmed the death toll was the driver of the travel public transport. "The driver was killed at the scene named Pipid Hamidum, 27 years old from Serang Regency, Banten," he said, Saturday, November 2, 2019.
Ricky could not confirm the condition of passenger vehicles carrying soldiers of the Indonesian National Army including Kasdam Siliwangi. Because the passengers and their vehicles were immediately taken by the TNI from the location shortly after the incident.
"I don't know because when I was there, the crime scene was clear," Ricky stressed. However, according to witnesses at the scene, the collision was known to have been caused by a travel vehicle that went off track so that it collided with another vehicle in the opposite direction.
The Toyota Hiace vehicle with police number B 7455 KAA drove from Bandung to Jakarta (line B). Upon arrival at the TKP in the Cibodas Village area Sukatani District Purwakarta Regency the vehicle was allegedly lost control.
"When driving in the right lane it is suspected that the driver is drowsy so that the vehicle is out of control, sloping to the right sliding into line A," Ricky said in his press statement. These public vehicles collided directly with vehicles on Line A that passed at the same time.
Ricky said that those involved in the crash included a travel vehicle, the Wing Box car numbered D 8168 GD driven by Kasiman (38). Also, two other vehicles carrying TNI members included Kasdam Siliwangi.
When confirmed through the Military District Command Section Intelligence Section Head 0619, Captain Arm Witopo, the condition of the Kasdam and the TNI personnel in the car were declared to be fine. "His information is fine, it's okay," he said via text message. ***
